title: A Good Sleep’ Best Friend!
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Hanamaru-chan, your lap pillow feels so good~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Is that so? Maru can’t really tell myself….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Kanata-san told me so. “Hanamaru-chan’s lap pillow is the best~” she said. She’s absolutely right….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ehehe, maybe Maru should write “Good at giving lap pillows” in my special skill section from now on<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>If you do that, everyone will fight over you, you know, Hanamaru-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>A battle for me…. Maru kind of wants to see that zura~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, I don’t think I can lose that battle…. Alright<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Huh? Have you had enough of my lap pillow already?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>If you keep giving it, you’ll get tired, right? That’s why we’ll switch, I’ll be the one to give you a lap pillow next~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eeeeh!? M-, Maru isn’t sleepy, so it’s fine~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
